hook_text: Baby dragon's rocket pack adventures: converging or diverging?

style_decision.reasoning: Family Guy is a well-established cartoon style that excels at humor and visual gags. A vibrant color palette will enhance the comedic and engaging nature of the content for a general Instagram audience, making abstract mathematical concepts visually appealing and memorable.

positioning_decision.reasoning: For Instagram, the bottom center position offers good visibility without obstructing key visual elements of the cartoon. It also keeps the overlay away from the critical bottom 20% of the screen as per the platform rules, ensuring important content isn't hidden.

ffmpeg_command: ffmpeg -i outputs/calculus_dragon_ep3_20250728_000317/temp_files/base_video.mp4 -vf drawtext=text='Rocket Diverge 🚀':fontcolor=#E74C3C:fontsize=42:font='Impact':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,6.0\,8.5),drawtext=text='Sequences Grow 🌱':fontcolor=#96CEB4:fontsize=38:font='Verdana-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#2C3E50@0.85:boxborderw=1:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,9.0\,11.5),drawtext=text='Ratio Test ✅':fontcolor=#5F27CD:fontsize=36:font='Georgia-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=1.5:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,12.0\,14.5),drawtext=text='Root Test 🤔':fontcolor=#00D2D3:fontsize=36:font='Trebuchet-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=1:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=200:enable=between(t\,15.0\,17.5),drawtext=text='Growth Speed 💨':fontcolor=#C44569:fontsize=40:font='Helvetica-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.85:boxborderw=1.5:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,18.0\,20.5),drawtext=text='Math Magic 🤯':fontcolor=#5F27CD:fontsize=42:font='Verdana-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FFFFFF@0.9:boxborderw=1.5:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1152:enable=between(t\,27.0\,29.5),drawtext=text='Follow for':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=56:font='Montserrat-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FF4500@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1720:enable=between(t\,24.57\,25.97),drawtext=text='more':fontcolor=#FFFFFF:fontsize=56:font='Montserrat-Bold':box=1:boxcolor=#FF4500@0.7:boxborderw=2:x=(w-text_w)/2:y=1640:enable=between(t\,26.07\,27.47) -c:a copy -y outputs/calculus_dragon_ep3_20250728_000317/temp_files/timed_overlays_base_video.mp4
